title: Typeface Suggestions Needed
content:
Hey guys,

I’m currently working on a project for a  
company who does musical and theater  
entertainment for the 50+ demographic.

What typefaces can you suggest to me  
that have fun, energetic qualities, yet  
still bold and professional that would  
cater to the 50+ demographic? Serif or  
sans, I’m looking for pretty much  
anything at this point.

I’m looking forward to hearing your  
suggestions.

—Sobering
author: Sobering
